snippet: When choosing credit cards to use for travel, be aware of their benefits and be prepared to keep track of the charges on them.
abstract: Joe Sharkey On the Road column advises business travelers to remain prudent when deciding between new crop of credit cards that seem to offer lavish travel perks; notes that because frequent applications can hurt credit scores, it is usually best to maintain only a few such cards.
lead_paragraph: When choosing credit cards to use for travel, be aware of their benefits and be prepared to keep track of the charges on them.

headline.print_headline: Practicing Prudence In Picking Travel Cards
headline.seo: Travel Credit Card Selection Requires Care - On the Road
headline.main: Practicing Prudence in Picking Travel Cards
